subject: Nazi Policies Toward Jews and Minorities
Football
Names, Organizational
lead_paragraph: The Jets’ and the Giants’ talks to sell the naming rights to their new stadium to Allianz, a company with historic ties to the Nazis, has met resistance from the public.
snippet: The Jets’ and the Giants’ talks to sell the naming rights to their new stadium to Allianz, a company with historic ties to the Nazis, has met resistance from the public.
